mapper.select: select b.no as no, b.title as title, b.contents as contents, b.hit as hit, date_format(b.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate, b.g_no, b.o_no, b.depth, u.no, u.name as userName, b.status from board b join user u on b.user_no = u.no where title like CONCAT('%', #{kwd}, '%') or contents like CONCAT('%', #{kwd}, '%') order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{startInex }, #{pageSize }

select b.no as no, b.title as title, b.contents as contents, b.hit as hit, date_format(b.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate, b.g_no as gNo, b.o_no as oNo, b.depth as depth, u.no as userNo, u.name as userName, b.status as status from board b join user u on b.user_no = u.no order by g_no desc, o_no asc, reg_date desc

select count(*) as listCount from board
where title like CONCAT('%', #{kwd}, '%') or contents like CONCAT('%', #{kwd}, '%')

select b.no as no, b.title as title, b.contents as contents, b.hit as hit, b.g_no as gNo, b.o_no as oNo, b.depth as depth, u.name as userName, u.no as userNo from board b join user u where b.user_no = u.no and b.no = #{boardNo }
mapper.insert: insert into board values(null, #{title }, #{contents}, 0, now(), (select ifnull(max(g_no) + 1, 1) as 'gNo' from board b), 1, 0, 0, #{userNo})
mapper.delete: update board set title = '삭제된 글 입니다.', status = status+1 where no = #{no }
mapper.update: update board set title = CONCAT('(수정)', #{title }), contents = #{contents }, status = status+2 where no = #{no }
